result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: We met each other in Paris.
result.ga: Bhuail muid le chéile i bPáras
result.orig: Bhuail muid le chéile i bPáras
result.html: Bhuail muid le chéile i bPárasWe met each other in Paris.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail muid le ċéile i bPárasWe met each other in Paris.

result.eng: I met him while I was in Galway.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh
result.html: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimhI met him while I was in Galway.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis agus mé i nGailliṁI met him while I was in Galway.

result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.html: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maithI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis an Taoiseaċ agus ḃuail mé leis an Uaċtarán ċoṁ maiṫI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.

result.eng: I met her in the street.
result.ga: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.orig: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.html: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.

result.eng: They ran into me on the road.
result.ga: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.orig: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.html: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhótharThey ran into me on the road.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail siad umam ar an ḃóṫarThey ran into me on the road.

result.eng: He threw on his uniform and left.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.orig: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.html: Bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imighHe threw on his uniform and left.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a éide uime agus d'imiġHe threw on his uniform and left.

result.html: Bhuail sé méHe hit me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé méHe hit me.

result.html: Bhuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: Tá ballḃrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.html: Bhuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: I never met a more slippery person.
result.ga: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.orig: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamh
result.html: Níor bhuail mé le duine ní ba shleamhaine riamhI never met a more slippery person.
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃuail mé le duine ní ba ẛleaṁaine riaṁI never met a more slippery person.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ga: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.orig: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.html: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dóiḃ filleaḋ aḃaile ḃuail an Príoṁ-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ga: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.orig: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.html: Bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé a mbéal fúṫu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
